title: can someone please help me find the font "basilea"
content: i am looking everywhere for a font named basilea. all i can find on the web is references to when it was created and who and all, but i can't find a place to purchase? any idea? greatly appreciated as always. please let me know.
author: griffin2501

comments.content: You could try putting tiny serifs back on [Eras](http://web.archive.org/web/20150227021843/http:/www.fonts.com/FindFonts/HiddenGems/Eras.htm).
My copy of Basilia was originally from ICG Image Club Graphics. Created in 1992. Hope this helps.

Do you mean [Basilia](http://web.archive.org/web/20150227021843/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=verity.search&searchstr=basilia) from Linotype? It's a very underrated didone. Thanks for reminding me of it.

here is a sample of the font, maybe it's not basilea? this scan is from a design package for a chinese hotel from the 80's? is it possible that the font isn't used very much anymore?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150227021843im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Alpha_6288.jpg)
